meanings.definition: A hormone produced by the pancreas that regulates blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent1: The insulin helps control how much sugar is in your blood.
meanings.sent2: My doctor prescribed insulin to manage my diabetes.
meanings.sent3: Without insulin, my blood sugar levels would throw a party!
meanings.sent4: Her insulin was like a diligent gatekeeper, ensuring sugar levels stayed in check.
meanings.sent5: The insulin acted like a traffic cop, directing sugar where it needed to go.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat diabetes.
meanings.sent1: I need to take insulin after meals to keep my blood sugar stable.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of insulin, causing a panic among diabetic patients.
meanings.sent3: The insulin bottle winked at me, reminding me to take my dose.
meanings.sent4: His insulin was a lifesaver, bringing balance to his sugar levels.
meanings.sent5: The insulin injection was a tiny superhero fighting against high blood sugar.
